long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to configure and save replacement profiles which describe the replacement rules for all links on pages and adds replaced links to the context menu of each link on the page. Each replacement profile contains two fields: pattern and replacement. Pattern can be a string, text of a regular expression or a special pattern like the following: «%all%», «%host%». Replacement is a string. Once you will configure the replacement profile you will be able to follow the replaced link by using original link's context menu. See examples in the screenshot below.
